pages.text: To get started in this mod, you need to collect as much $(l:e_item_deep_crystal_powder)Deep Crystal Powder/el as you can. This item is useful in some crafting recipes, but the main reason why you need it is to smelt it into $(l:e_item_deep_crystal)Deep Crystals/el./br2Since you are obviously interested in becoming a magician, you might want to know what you can do with the $(l:e_story_depth_magic)power of the depths/el.

Therefore this list of features might help you decide if you really want to continue this path, or if you rather run away in fear./li$(l:e_spell_overview)Spells/el/liArmor/liTools/li$(l:e_ritual_overview)Rituals/el/liVisit other $(l:e_dimension_overview)Dimensions/el/liResource farming
